pages.text: This will make the $(l:tools/drone)Drone/$ move to the nearest inventory within the specified $(l:programming/area)area/$, extract items from that inventory and insert them into the $(item)Drone's/$ inventory.$(p)$(thing)Right-click/$ the widget for a setup GUI where you can specify the side the $(item)Drone/$ should extract the items from. You can also specify the maximum number of items to import.

You can also connect any number (including zero) of $(l:programming/item_filter)Item Filter/$ widgets to limit the items that may be imported. Remember, filters on the $(italic)right/$ acts as a whitelist, and filters on the $(italic)left/$ act as a blacklist.$(p)This widget is done executing when the $(item)Drone's/$ inventory is full, or when no more (applicable) items can be found in the relevant inventory (or inventories).
